snippet: The bug known as Heartbleed illustrates that the Internet is still in its youth, and vulnerable to all sorts of unseen dangers, including simple human error.
abstract: Farhad Manjoo State of the Art column warns that the computer bug known as Heartbleed is stark reminder that the Internet is still in its youth, and vulnerable to all sorts of unseen dangers, including simple human error; asserts that digital systems are complex and penetrate every corner of people's lives making it impossible to lock them down.
lead_paragraph: The bug known as Heartbleed illustrates that the Internet is still in its youth, and vulnerable to all sorts of unseen dangers, including simple human error.

headline.main: Users’ Stark Reminder: As Web Grows, It Grows Less Secure
headline.print_headline: Users’ Stark Reminder: As Web Grows, It Grows Less Secure
